text: "Master and Servant" is a 1984 song by British band Depeche Mode and is the second single from their fourth studio album Some Great Reward. It went to number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 87 in the United States, number 8 in Switzerland, number 6 in Ireland and Belgium, number 4 in Denmark, number 7 in Sweden and number 13 in the Netherlands. ==Track listings== All tracks written by Martin L.
